entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 7:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
